##Data Cleaning
```{r}


brfss_df = brfss_smart2010 %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  filter(class == "Health Status") %>%
  filter(response %in% c("Excellent", "Good", "Poor", "Very good", "Fair")) %>%
  mutate(response = factor(response, levels = c("Poor", "Fair", "Good", "Very good", "Excellent")))


```
